question: 除く
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>exclude</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to exclude</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You would like to exclude your <reading>nose</reading> (<ja>のぞ</ja>) because you don't like your nose. Imagine your strong feelings about your nose as you decide to exclude it.
